Broadlist Years Lists

The Hugo Award for Best Novel recognizes a work that was published in the previous calendar year (the 2024 award, for example, recognizes books published in 2023). To account for this, Broadlist files these lists into the year of the works published - not the year of the award name.

2023 Hugo Award for Best Novel

In the Hugo Award for Best Novel list selected 6 books.

Broadlist has categorized these selections as:

  • Shortlist (6 books)
  • Winners (1 books)

Read more about how Broadlist categorizes lists.

Source: 2023 Hugo Award for Best Novel

  • The Daughter of Doctor Moreau by Silvia Moreno

  • The Kaiju Preservation Society by John Scalzi

  • The Spare Man by Mary Robinette Kowal

Winners
